text:
Crushed dead worker, new investigations begin
At the workplace
01 Nov 2019, 08:27 by Redazione



Yesterday, engineer Alessandro Lima, a former consultant to the Public Prosecutor's Office in some important cases of workplace accidents, carried out a visit to Bisaccia. Photographic surveys performed.
The investigation is coordinated by the deputy prosecutor, Cecilia Annecchini, who has delegated the investigations to the carabinieri.
